description:
GREAT...YOU JUST BAKED YOUR CAKE!

Drop the cake on plate by drawing proper straight line before it smash. Avoid other obstacles while dropping cake.

IT'S SO SIMPLE...DROP IT!

DOWNLOAD CAKE DELIGHT for FREE now!
